Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.client.gui.controllers

Class ChatController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.client.gui.controllers.AbstractController
it.polimi.ingsw.view.client.gui.controllers.ChatController
public class ChatController extends AbstractController
Class representing Chat controller. It manages the messages of the various players, that can be sent in broadcast or in unicast.
